summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of CredMax fintech application. All core features tested including authentication, card management, AI recommendations, ML analytics, and rewards system. Backend APIs achieved 100% success rate, frontend functionality working excellently with modern glassmorphism design.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section and CTA buttons
Dashboard displays total points, cards overview, and quick actions
Add credit card functionality with all required fields
AI-powered card recommendations using OpenAI GPT-5.2
Spending analytics with ML clustering insights
Rewards page with expiry alerts and redemption suggestions
Navigation between all pages working smoothly
All 12 backend API endpoints (auth, cards, recommendations, transactions, analytics, rewards)
AI insights generation using Emergent LLM service
ML spending pattern analysis with scikit-learn
Dark theme with glassmorphism design implementation
Responsive UI with proper data-testid attributes
